revision.text:
{{Infobox Mega Stone |name = Audinite |image = [[File:Audinite.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of ''Audinite'' |location = Reward from beating [[Temporary Battles#Unova|Dream Researcher]] in [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]]. }} ==Description== '''Audinite''' is a [[Mega Evolution#Mega Pokémon|Mega Stone]] that is used in combination with a Key Stone to [[Mega Evolution|Mega Evolve]] Audino into Mega Audino. ==Requirements== In order to Mega Evolve Audino into Mega Audino, 10,400 attack must first be attained on Audino through breeding. Once Audino has 10,400 or more attack, using a [[Key Stone]] on it will cause it to Mega Evolve into Mega Audino. {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Pokémon !! Mega Evolution !! Attack Required !! Mega Stone |- | {{Pokemon|Audino}} || {{Pokemon|Mega Audino}} || style="text-align:center" | 10,400+ || style="text-align:center" | [[File:Audinite.png|50px]] |- |} ==Acquisition== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Trainer !! Location !! Requirement !! Reward |- | [[Temporary Battles#Unova|Dream Researcher]] || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] || All 3 [[Dream Orbs|Therian Pokémon]] Caught || {{Pokemon|Audinite}} |- |}
{{Mega Stones}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Mega Stones]]
